default264.name: default264
default264.command: ffmpeg -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i pulse -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 24k -ar 22050 -maxrate 750k -bufsize 5000k -f flv

default264New.name: default264New
default264New.command: -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i pulse -vcodec libx264 -preset slow -tune zerolatency -r 25 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 4500k -bufsize 9000k -f flv

raspberry_UsbCamLow.name: raspberry_UsbCamLow
raspberry_UsbCamLow.command: -f video4linux2 -s qvga -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 24k -ar 22050 -maxrate 750k -bufsize 5000k -f flv

raspberry_UsbCamMed.name: raspberry_UsbCamMed
raspberry_UsbCamMed.command: -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 5000k -f flv

raspberry_UsbCamMed_25fps.name: raspberry_UsbCamMed_25fps
raspberry_UsbCamMed_25fps.command: -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 5000k -f flv

raspberry_UsbCamHigh.name: raspberry_UsbCamHigh
raspberry_UsbCamHigh.command: -f video4linux2 -s hd720 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 4000k -bufsize 8000k -f flv

raspberry_UsbCamHigh_25fps.name: raspberry_UsbCamHigh_25fps
raspberry_UsbCamHigh_25fps.command: -f video4linux2 -s hd720 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 4000k -bufsize 8000k -f flv

default264Speakers.name: default264Speakers
default264Speakers.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f pulse -i alsa_output.0.analog-stereo.monitor -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 1500k -bufsize 3000k -f flv

testVideoAndMp3PipeIn.name: testVideoAndMp3PipeIn
testVideoAndMp3PipeIn.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -f flv

testVideoAndMp3PipeInFFlags.name: testVideoAndMp3PipeInFFlags
testVideoAndMp3PipeInFFlags.command: -f video4linux2 -fflags nobuffer -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -4.0 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -f flv

ytPipeInMp3.name: ytPipeInMp3
ytPipeInMp3.command: -f video4linux2 -fflags nobuffer -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -9.5 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -f flv

testVideoAndMp3PipeInAndFilter.name: testVideoAndMp3PipeInAndFilter
testVideoAndMp3PipeInAndFilter.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

testVideoAndMp3PipeInWithOffset.name: testVideoAndMp3PipeInWithOffset
testVideoAndMp3PipeInWithOffset.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -3.5 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -f flv

testVideoAndMp3PipeInAndFilter2.name: testVideoAndMp3PipeInAndFilter2
testVideoAndMp3PipeInAndFilter2.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -2.15 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

AlmostInSyncASUS.name: AlmostInSyncASUS
AlmostInSyncASUS.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

AlmostInSyncASUS2.name: AlmostInSyncASUS2
AlmostInSyncASUS2.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -2.15 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -ar 44100 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -f flv

AlmostInSyncASUSyt.name: AlmostInSyncASUSyt
AlmostInSyncASUSyt.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -1.50 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -ar 44100 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

AlmostInSyncASUSaltEncoder.name: AlmostInSyncASUSaltEncoder
AlmostInSyncASUSaltEncoder.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -2.15 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -ar 44100 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

altFormat.name: altFormat
altFormat.command: -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -2.15 -i pipe:0 -c:v libvpx -b:v 6000k -qmin 10 -qmax 42 -maxrate 500k -bufsize 1500k -threads 8 -vf scale=-1:720 -ar 44100 -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f webm

youtube240p.name: youtube240p
youtube240p.command: -f video4linux2 -s 426x240 -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 500k -bufsize 500k; -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

youtube360p.name: youtube360p
youtube360p.command: -f video4linux2 -s 640x360 -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 800k -bufsize 800k; -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

youtube480p.name: youtube480p
youtube480p.command: -f video4linux2 -s 854x480 -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 1200k -bufsize 1200k; -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

youtube720p.name: youtube720p
youtube720p.command: -f video4linux2 -s 1280x720 -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 2600k -bufsize 2600k; -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

youtube1080p.name: youtube1080p
youtube1080p.command: -f video4linux2 -s 1920x1080 -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 4500k -bufsize 9000k; -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

testPipePipe.name: testPipePipe
testPipePipe.command: -f video4linux2 -s 640x360 -i /dev/video0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 800k -bufsize 800k | ffmpeg -f flv -i - -f flv

pipeAVToFFexec.name: pipeAVToFFexec
pipeAVToFFexec.command: avconv -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -vcodec libx264 -f flv - | ffmpeg -i - recordings/test.flv

pipeAVToFFexecPIPE.name: pipeAVToFFexecPIPE
pipeAVToFFexecPIPE.command: avconv -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -vcodec libx264 -f flv - | ffmpeg -f flv -i - recordings/test.flv

pipeFFToFFexec.name: pipeFFToFFexec
pipeFFToFFexec.command: ffmpeg -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -vcodec libx264 -f flv - | ffmpeg -f flv -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -ar 44100 recordings/test.flv

pipeFFToFFexecAdvanced.name: pipeFFToFFexecAdvanced
pipeFFToFFexecAdvanced.command: ffmpeg -f v4l2 -i /dev/video0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 500k -bufsize 1000k -f flv - | ffmpeg -f flv -re -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -ar 44100 recordings/test.flv

pipeFFToFFexecAdvanced2.name: pipeFFToFFexecAdvanced2
pipeFFToFFexecAdvanced2.command: ffmpeg -f v4l2 -i /dev/video0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -maxrate 500k -bufsize 500k -f flv - | ffmpeg -f flv -itsoffset 1.45 -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -ar 44100 recordings/test.flv

newTest.name: newTest
newTest.command: ffmpeg -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i pulse -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 24k -ar 22050 -maxrate 750k -bufsize 5000k -f flv recordings/test.flv

raspiToFFPipe.name: raspiToFFPipe
raspiToFFPipe.command: raspivid -t -1 -w 960 -h 540 -fps 25 -b 500000 -vf -rot 135 -o - | ffmpeg -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -ar 44100 -f flv test.flv

raspiToFFPipe2.name: raspiToFFPipe2
raspiToFFPipe2.command: raspivid -t 0 -w 1280 -h 720 -vf -rot 270 -o - | ffmpeg -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -ar 44100 -f flv test.flv

raspiToFFPipe3.name: raspiToFFPipe3
raspiToFFPipe3.command: raspivid -t 0 -w 1280 -h 720 -vf -rot 270 -o - | ffmpeg -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 1000k -ar 44100 -f flv recordings/test.flv

raspiToFFPipeYT.name: raspiToFFPipeYT
raspiToFFPipeYT.command: raspivid -n -t 0 -w 1280 -h 720 -b 1000000 -vf -rot 270 -o - | ffmpeg -f h264 -re -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 1000k -ar 44100 -f flv rtmp://a.rtmp.youtube.com/live2/8ehu-r120-04ac-9h04

raspiToFFPipeYT2.name: raspiToFFPipeYT2
raspiToFFPipeYT2.command: raspivid -n -t 0 -w 854 -h 480 -fps 30 -b 1000000 -vf -rot 270 -o - | ffmpeg -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -r 30 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 1000k -ar 44100 -f flv rtmp://a.rtmp.youtube.com/live2/8ehu-r120-04ac-9h04

raspiToFFPipeYT3.name: raspiToFFPipeYT3
raspiToFFPipeYT3.command: raspivid -n -t 0 -w 854 -h 480 -fps 30 -b 900000 -vf -rot 270 -o - | ffmpeg -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv rtmp://a.rtmp.youtube.com/live2/8ehu-r120-04ac-9h04

raspiToFFPipeUDP.name: raspiToFFPipeUDP
raspiToFFPipeUDP.command: raspivid -n -t 0 -w 854 -h 480 -fps 30 -b 900000 -vf -rot 270 -o - | ffmpeg -re -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -vcodec libx264 -ar 44100 -f mpegts udp://192.168.0.28:8020

raspiToFFPipeTCP.name: raspiToFFPipeTCP
raspiToFFPipeTCP.command: raspivid -n -t 0 -w 854 -h 480 -fps 30 -b 900000 -vf -rot 270 -o - | ffmpeg -re -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f mpegts tcp://192.168.0.28:8021?listen

raspiToFFPipeToFile.name: raspiToFFPipeToFile
raspiToFFPipeToFile.command: raspivid -n -t 0 -w 854 -h 480 -fps 30 -b 900000 -vf -rot 270 -o - | ffmpeg -re -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv recordings/test.flv

raspiToFFPipeToFile2.name: raspiToFFPipeToFile2
raspiToFFPipeToFile2.command: raspivid -t 0 -n -w 1280 -h 720 -fps 30 -b 900000 -vf -rot 0 -o - | ffmpeg -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -itsoffset 0.8 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv

raspiToFFPipeToFileLatest.name: raspiToFFPipeToFileLatest
raspiToFFPipeToFileLatest.command: raspivid -t 0 -n -w 854 -h 480 -fps 30 -b 900000 -vf -rot 0 -o - | ffmpeg -vsync cfr -fflags nobuffer -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -fflags nobuffer -analyzeduration 0 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv recordings/test.flv

raspiToFFPipeToLive.name: raspiToFFPipeToLive
raspiToFFPipeToLive.command: raspivid -t 0 -w 1280 -h 720 -fps 30 -b 900000 -vf -rot 0 -o - | ffmpeg -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -itsoffset 0.8 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv rtmp://a.rtmp.youtube.com/live2/8ehu-r120-04ac-9h04

raspiToFFPipeToFile3.name: raspiToFFPipeToFile3
raspiToFFPipeToFile3.command: raspivid -t 0 -n -w 1280 -h 720 -fps 30 -b 900000 -vf -rot 0 -o - | ffmpeg -r 30 -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -itsoffset -0.75 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv

raspiToFFPipeToFileMayStana.name: raspiToFFPipeToFileMayStana
raspiToFFPipeToFileMayStana.command: raspivid -t 0 -n -w 1280 -h 720 -fps 30 -b 900000 -vf -rot 0 -o - | ffmpeg -r 30 -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -itsoffset -0.2 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv

raspiToFFPipeToFileMayStanaLive.name: raspiToFFPipeToFileMayStanaLive
raspiToFFPipeToFileMayStanaLive.command: raspivid -t 0 -n -w 1280 -h 720 -fps 30 -b 900000 -vf -rot 0 -o - | ffmpeg -r 30 -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -itsoffset -0.2 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv

yetAnotherTest.name: yetAnotherTest
yetAnotherTest.command: raspivid -t 0 -n -w 854 -h 480 -fps 30 -b 550000 -vf -rot 0 -o - | ffmpeg -r 30 -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv

10+ min synced.name: 10+ min synced
10+ min synced.command: raspivid -t 0 -n -w 854 -h 480 -fps 30 -b 550000 -vf -rot 0 -o - | ffmpeg -r 30 -f h264 -i - -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv

synced2.name: synced2
synced2.command: avconv -f video4linux2 -s vga -r 30 -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -i pipe:1 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 30 -ar 44100 -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 1000k -f flv

lattest.name: lattest
lattest.command: raspivid -t 0 -n -w 854 -h 480 -fps 30 -b 550000 -vf -rot 0 -o - | ffmpeg -r 30 -f h264 -thread_queue_size 512 -i - -f mp3 -thread_queue_size 512 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv

lattestHQ.name: lattestHQ
lattestHQ.command: raspivid -t 0 -n -w 1920 -h 1080 -fps 30 -b 4500000 -vf -rot 0 -o - | ffmpeg -r 30 -f h264 -thread_queue_size 512 -i - -f mp3 -thread_queue_size 512 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv

Generic Local Test (No Audio).name: Generic Local Test (No Audio)
Generic Local Test (No Audio).command: ffmpeg -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -r 25 -g 50 -threads 0 -vcodec libx264 -preset slow -tune zerolatency -pix_fmt yuv420p -maxrate 500k -bufsize 500k -f flv

Generic Local Test (With Audio).name: Generic Local Test (With Audio)
Generic Local Test (With Audio).command: ffmpeg -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i pulse -vcodec libx264 -preset fast -tune zerolatency -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -r 25 -g 50 -f flv

Generic Local Test (Audio from client).name: Generic Local Test (Audio from client)
Generic Local Test (Audio from client).command: avconv -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -r 25 -g 50 -threads 0 -vcodec libx264 -preset slow -tune zerolatency -pix_fmt yuv420p -maxrate 500k -bufsize 500k -f flv - | ffmpeg -f flv -thread_queue_size 1024 -i - -f mp3 -thread_queue_size 1024 -i pipe:1 -vcodec copy -ar 44100 -f flv
